page.title: 01GENERAL REVIEW
page.content: The area of land in this section lies on the eastern side of Macclesfield.To the northern side of the block there is an industrial estate,some private housing and a council estate on which there are 2 tower blocks.On the central western side around the local comprehensive school there is a complex of council flats built in the 1960's,private housing and the canal on which is situated a marina. To the south there is the local golf club,extensive farmland and a country park. As one proceeds eastwards across the block the terrain rises steeply to the Pennines and local hills called the Hollins.The south eastern sector abutts the Macclesfield Forest.
